title: Advanced Electrical Engineering Course Based on Remote Laboratory

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational electrical engineering theory and circuit analysis experience
context.additional_context: A course designed for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to apply electrical engineering theories to practice, offering an asynchronous learning environment via digital devices.

learning_goals: Simulate actual circuit design and experimentation processes using a remote laboratory (RL)
Demonstrate practical problem-solving skills by completing project-based tasks based on electrical engineering theory
Participate in experimental data analysis and result interpretation with peer learners via collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
